definition: the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Paraphrases provide sufficient information, clear directions and rich examples. It is the model of new dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 释义准确全面，例证丰富，是新型词典的典范。

sentences.english: If you look further, you'll find better definitions.
sentences.chinese: 如果大家再查一下，会找到更好的释义。

sentences.english: So this article will discuss the origin and development of its edition and its explanation.
sentences.chinese: 文章就《玉篇》的版本流变及其释义加以论述。

sentences.english: The essay points out the authors' question from different angles as inappropriateness and mistakes interpretation of word.
sentences.chinese: 文章从欠当和失误的角度对其释义提出了质疑。

sentences.english: The explanation in this dictionary is concise and to the point.
sentences.chinese: 这部词典里的释义简明扼要。

sentences.english: Verify that the definition is present.
sentences.chinese: 验证是否给出了该单词释义。

sentences.english: See demonstration of OPM3 and interpret the results based on the simulation where your team participated.
sentences.chinese: OPM3演示，基于小组模拟评估结果进行释义。

sentences.english: These days, however, Google is our database of meaning.
sentences.chinese: 不过，谷歌如今已成为了我们的释义数据库。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
